title: Rotating game mode: now blasting through Mondays

replies.body: Twisted Treeline from Tues to Thurs, then RGM from Friday to Monday? I'm happy.
watch people complain anyway instead of being thankful for the extra time
So when is Mac going to get out of beta stage?
When you throw your pretentious Mac in the rubbish and get Windows.

> [{quoted}](name=rainer217,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=LI99deoX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-19T11:37:18.783+0000)
>
> So when is Mac going to get out of beta stage?

The Alpha Client will be created as a native Mac and Windows application!
>The Alpha client is meant to run on both Mac and Windows :)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/na/site/2016-season-update/client-update.html
This is good. Yes, this is good.
